description: Create a Vite project. Used to build JavaScript projects. Available templates: vanilla, vanilla-ts, vue, vue-ts, react, react-ts, react-swc, react-swc-ts, preact, preact-ts, lit, lit-ts, svelte, svelte-ts. More information: https://vitejs.dev/guide.
